title: Look at this... can we please make minions smarter...
body:
Like seriously, what is this?

the inhibitor is up (Respawned while this super minion and I were attacking the turret) so i went to go attack the inhibitor but this prime example of the super minion race kept attacking the now un-targetable turret (while continuously being shot at in the process) and didn't fall back to the inhibitor to attack that, even though it was the only thing nearby that was targetable.

you can get a sense of time in the picture from the lowered health of the inhibitor (so you know that it did just stay there)

this is only one of the many many silly things that minions get up to. Can we please give them a little more intelligence?
(as well as obviously a much needed smaller unit collision box...)

replies.body:
I think they r planning on hitbox 
But maybe not intellegence
It's intended as a gameplay feature if they knew how to turn back to the inhibs it would be overpowered/unfair besides minions from a thematic standpoint are supposed to be braindead retards.

so how can they attack an un-targetable target? that counteracts the physics of the game.

plus its not that unfair, the team has put in the effort to destroy the inhibitor and spawn however many super minions they get, how is it fair that one of their super minions is wasted like that?
